trans-unit.source: Represents an application that is available for use with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma aplicação que está disponível para utilização com a infraestrutura de colaboração ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: An application is a set of software or software features available to a peer from an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Uma aplicação é um conjunto de funcionalidades de software disponíveis ou de software para um elemento de rede de um ponto final.

trans-unit.source: Commonly, this refers to network-enabled software packages such as games or other collaborative applications.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, isto refere-se aos pacotes de software ativado por rede, tais como jogos ou outras aplicações de colaboração.

trans-unit.source: A PeerApplication defines the set of software applications or components available for use with the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> network.
trans-unit.target: Um PeerApplication define o conjunto de aplicações de software ou componentes disponíveis para utilização com o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>rede.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>

trans-unit.source: This network enables infrastructure participants to initiate usage of this application.
trans-unit.target: Esta rede permite participantes de infraestrutura iniciar a utilização desta aplicação.

trans-unit.source: They may initiate a collaboration session using the application identified by this class.
trans-unit.target: Podem iniciar uma sessão de colaboração com a aplicação identificada por esta classe.

trans-unit.source: After constructing an instance of this class and setting the appropriate properties, this object may be used in <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer> collaboration sessions.
trans-unit.target: Depois de construir uma instância desta classe e definir as propriedades adequadas, este objeto pode ser utilizado numa <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer>sessões de colaboração.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer>

trans-unit.source: Its use is accomplished by passing it to the peer collaboration <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.RegisterApplication%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.UnregisterApplication%2A> methods, which will enable or disable it.
trans-unit.target: A sua utilização é conseguida através da transmissão para o elemento de rede colaboração <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.RegisterApplication%2A>e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.UnregisterApplication%2A>métodos, que irão ativar ou desativar o mesmo.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.UnregisterApplication%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.RegisterApplication%2A>

trans-unit.source: The globally unique <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> properties of this instance must be set before the application can successfully be registered.
trans-unit.target: Globalmente exclusivo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A>e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType>Propriedades desta instância tem de ser definidas antes da aplicação pode ser registada com êxito.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: After registering an application with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure, the registration information persists in the registry.
trans-unit.target: Depois de registar uma aplicação com a infraestrutura de colaboração ponto a ponto, as informações de registo mantém-se no registo.

trans-unit.source: This makes the application available to collaboration applications even after the program which registered the application has exited.
trans-unit.target: Isto faz com que a aplicação disponível para as aplicações de colaboração, mesmo depois do programa que registar a aplicação foi terminado.

trans-unit.source: Changing the properties on an application instance after it has been registered has no effect on the registration.
trans-unit.target: Alterar as propriedades de uma instância da aplicação depois de serem registado não tem qualquer efeito no registo.

trans-unit.source: To update the registration, the application must be deregistered and then registered again with the new information.
trans-unit.target: Para atualizar o registo, a aplicação tem de ser anulou o registo e, em seguida, registada novamente com as novas informações.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância predefinida do <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> tipo.

trans-unit.source: The globally unique <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> properties of this instance must be set before the application can successfully be registered.
trans-unit.target: Globalmente exclusivo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A>e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType>Propriedades desta instância tem de ser definidas antes da aplicação pode ser registada com êxito.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> type with the data required for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> tipo com os dados necessários para a serialização.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> object with a name fully qualified by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> object within it.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>objeto com um nome totalmente qualificado pelo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>objeto dentro do mesmo.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>

trans-unit.source: The globally unique <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> properties of this instance must be set before the application can successfully be registered.
trans-unit.target: Globalmente exclusivo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A>e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType>Propriedades desta instância tem de ser definidas antes da aplicação pode ser registada com êxito.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The serialization destination associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O destino de serialização associado a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance with the supplied application ID, description, scope, and data elements.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> instância com os elementos de ID, descrição, âmbito e dados de aplicação fornecido.

trans-unit.source: The globally unique <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> properties of this instance must be set before the application can successfully be registered.
trans-unit.target: Globalmente exclusivo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A>e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType>Propriedades desta instância tem de ser definidas antes da aplicação pode ser registada com êxito.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: A user-specified <xref:System.Guid> used to identify the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um utilizador-especificada <xref:System.Guid>utilizado para identificar o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> description of the peer application.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>Descrição da aplicação de ponto a ponto.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A binary data object to associate with the peer application, such as a small image.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de dados binários para associar a aplicação de ponto a ponto, tal como uma imagem de pequena.

trans-unit.source: The local file system path to the peer application.
trans-unit.target: O caminho de sistema de ficheiros local para a aplicação de ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: Command-line arguments for starting the peer application.
trans-unit.target: Argumentos da linha de comandos para iniciar a aplicação de ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: The scope in which the application will be registered for peer collaboration.
trans-unit.target: O âmbito em que a aplicação será registada para colaboração ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: - Length of the binary data object cannot be less than one or greater than 16k.
trans-unit.target: -Comprimento do objeto de dados binários não pode ser menor que um ou maior que 16k.

trans-unit.source: - id is set to .
trans-unit.target: - id is set to .

trans-unit.source: This event is raised whenever a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> is added, updated or deleted by a remote peer on a subscribed endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é desencadeado sempre que um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> é adicionada, atualizado ou eliminada por um elemento remoto um ponto de final subscrito.

trans-unit.source: Use of this event requires a value of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> in the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaborationPermission> object that was created when the peer collaboration session began.
trans-unit.target: A utilização deste evento requer um valor de <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>no <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>do <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaborationPermission>objeto que foi criado quando iniciou a sessão de colaboração ponto a ponto.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaborationPermission> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets command-line parameters to use when initiating a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os parâmetros da linha de comandos a utilizar quando inicia um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> that represents application-specific command-line parameters to use when initiating the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>que representa os parâmetros de linha de comandos específicos da aplicação a utilizar quando iniciar o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets data associated with the current <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os dados associados a atual <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: This data is free form and is provided by the hosting peer.
trans-unit.target: Estes dados é gratuito formulário e são fornecidos pelo elemento de rede de alojamento.

trans-unit.source: The maximum amount of data that can be provided is 4,096 bytes.
trans-unit.target: A quantidade máxima de dados que podem ser fornecidas é 4.096 bytes.

trans-unit.source: This data is not part of a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> invitation, but rather allows additional data to be associated with the application on the local peer.
trans-unit.target: Estes dados não são parte de um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>convite, mas em vez disso permite adicionais dados associado à aplicação no elemento de rede local.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref:System.Byte> data that contain a binary object to associate with the peer application.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de <xref:System.Byte>dados que contenham um objeto de binário para associar a aplicação de ponto a ponto.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: This is commonly a small image or XML blob.
trans-unit.target: Este é normalmente uma imagem de pequena ou BLOBs XML.

trans-unit.source: The size of this binary data object is either less than 0 or greater than 4,096 bytes.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho deste objeto de dados binário é inferior a 0 ou mais de 4.096 bytes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Unicode <xref:System.String> that describes the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um Unicode <xref:System.String>que descreve o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This data is not part of a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> invitation.
trans-unit.target: Estes dados não são parte de um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>convite.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>

trans-unit.source: However, it is displayed on the user interface when a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> receives an invitation for the application.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, é apresentada no utilizador interface quando um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>recebe um convite para a aplicação.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> value that describes the application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>valor que descreve a aplicação.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Unless specified, the default value for this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A menos que especificado, o valor predefinido para esta propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Releases resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objeto e, opcionalmente, liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: Set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Compares the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Compara o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> para especificado <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: No normalizations are performed on the strings prior to comparison.
trans-unit.target: Não existem normalizations são executadas em cadeias antes de comparação.

trans-unit.source: All normalization should have been completed while or before constructing the PeerApplication objects.
trans-unit.target: Todos os normalização deve foram concluída durante ou antes de construir os objetos de PeerApplication.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> instância de teste de igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance provided has matching data, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> instância fornecida tem de correspondência de dados, outros <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method also returns if other is .
trans-unit.target: This method also returns if other is .

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Isto <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Compares the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> to the specified <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Compara o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> para especificada <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>para teste de igualdade.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> is equal to the specified object instance, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> é igual à instância do objeto especificado, pessoa <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>foi eliminado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> objects are considered equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se especificado <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objetos são considerados iguais.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified objects have the same globally unique application <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id*> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Description*>, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se os objetos especificados tem a mesma aplicação globalmente exclusiva <> </> *> e <> </> *>, pessoa <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o código hash para uma <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code used to compare instances of this type.
trans-unit.target: Um 32 bits com sinal código hash de número inteiro utilizado para comparar as instâncias deste tipo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data needed to serialize the target <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Preenche um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> com os dados necessários para serializar o destino <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> para preencher com dados.

trans-unit.source: The destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: O destino para esta serialização.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined <xref:System.Guid> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o definido pelo utilizador <xref:System.Guid>associados a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: `Null` items are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: `Null`não são permitidos itens.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Guid> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>associado a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Unless specified, the default value for this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A menos que especificado, o valor predefinido para esta propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.ApplicationChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.ApplicationChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from this class can override this delegate to perform additional tasks when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: As classes que herdam desta classe podem substituir este delegado para efetuar tarefas adicionais quando o evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ApplicationChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains data to be passed to delegates for the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.ApplicationChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ApplicationChangedEventArgs"> </xref> objeto que contém os dados sejam transferidos para delegados para os <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.ApplicationChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path that designates where the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> executable file resides on the local file system.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caminho que designa onde o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> reside o ficheiro executável no sistema de ficheiros local.

trans-unit.source: `Null` or <xref:System.String.Empty> values are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: `Null`ou <xref:System.String.Empty>não são permitidos valores.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> that represents the file path.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>que representa o caminho do ficheiro.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A menos que especificado explicitamente, o valor predefinido para esta propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scope in which the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> is registered for collaboration.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o âmbito no qual o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> está registado para colaboração.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope"></xref> object that specifies the scope in which the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> will collaborate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope"></xref>objeto que especifica o âmbito no qual o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> irão colaborar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: When this property value is set, all events not fired as the result of an asynchronous operation will have the associated event handlers called back on the thread that created the specific <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando este valor da propriedade está definida, todos os eventos não desencadeados como resultado de uma operação assíncrona terão os processadores do evento associado novamente chamados num thread que criou o específicos <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject*>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject*>

trans-unit.source: The default set value for this property is `null`, indicating that all event handlers are called on a system thread pool thread.
trans-unit.target: O valor de conjunto predefinido para esta propriedade é `null`, que indica que todos os processadores de eventos são chamados num thread de conjunto de threads de sistema.

trans-unit.source: This property is typically set to a UI element such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> instance.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade normalmente, é definida para um elemento de IU como uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>instância.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: Object that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"></xref> interface and is used by instances of this type for event handler synchronization on the thread that created it.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que implementa o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"> </xref> interface e é utilizado por instâncias deste tipo de sincronização de processador de eventos no thread que o criou.

trans-unit.source: The calling object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto chamado foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable"></xref> interface and returns the data required to serialize the target <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable"> </xref> interface e devolve os dados necessários para serializar o destino <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objeto para preencher com dados.

trans-unit.source: The destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: O destino para esta serialização.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id*> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Description*> of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma cadeia que contém o <> </> *> e <> </> *> do <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: This method inherits the default signature and behavior from <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Este método herda a assinatura predefinida e o comportamento de <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id*> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Description*> of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance, separated by a space.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o <> </> *> e <> </> *> do <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> instância, separada por um espaço.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.
